title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 804.7 - Office's failure to respond
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 804.7 - Office's failure to respond

State Regulations
A failure to grant or deny access to records within five
business days of the receipt of a request or within 30 days of an
acknowledgment of the receipt of such request, or failure to respond to a
request for correction or amendment of a record within 30 business days of
receipt of such a request, shall be construed as a denial that may be
appealed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
804.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
